title: Staff
main_content: Departmental Staff Our departmental staff is available to help current or prospective engineering students, faculty and staff with any questions they may have about the department, degree requirements, or advising. For more information, see the list below for the appropriate contact. Irene Clements Graduate Program Coordinator Office: Room 201, LRSM Phone: 215-898-8337 Email: ipc@seas.upenn.edu Vicky Lee Undergraduate Program Coordinator Office: Room 201, LRSM Phone: 215-898-8337 Email: vickylt@seas.upenn.edu Pat Overend Assistant to Chair; Office Manager Office: Room 200, LRSM Phone: 215-898-8337 Email: poverend@seas.upenn.edu John Russell Marketing Coordinator Office: Room 302, LRSM Phone: 215-898-2462 Email: johnruss@seas.upenn.edu Steve Szewczyk Manager, Instruction Laboratories Office: Room 7A, LRSM Phone: 215-898-8717 Email: sts23@seas.upenn.edu Departmental Offices: The MSE Main offices are located in Room 200 LRSM, 3231 Walnut Street. The main number for the Department is 215-898-8337.
